name: ModifyLoadingLayer
description: ModifyLoadingLayer allows you to modify the loading screen however you want, and be able to share it, this mod also includes an index, which allows you to share your custom loading screens, although every loading screen has to be approved, have fun!

disable-load.name: Disable Loading
disable-load.description: Stops the game from loading. There is a keyboard toggle on Desktop, press the space key to continue loading the game, as for mobile, a button is located in the loading screen that continues loading the game.
